childMarkdownRemark.html:
An initiative to rebuild a run down masjid frequented by locals for congregational prayers in a remote village near Sakro, Sindh, Pakistan.

Waqas (our lead) has facilitated 29 masaajid ma sha Allah without charging a single penny.

We will have a few options to chose from.

One of the options is shared here with budget of 520k pkr.
An initiative to rebuild a run down masjid frequented by locals for congregational prayers in a remote village near Sakro, Sindh, Pakistan.
